thread.title: Calls for more staff in palliative care to allow more Australians to die at home
thread.title_full: Calls for more staff in palliative care to allow more Australians to die at home

title: Calls for more staff in palliative care to allow more Australians to die at home
text:
Topix › Pacific Travel › Calls for more staff in palliative ca... Calls for more staff in palliative care to allow more Australians to die at home 1 hr ago Read more: Australian Broadcasting Corporation 
TIM PALMER: Being able to die at home, in familiar surroundings and in the presence of family is by some accounts how around 80 per cent of Australians would choose to end their days. It's believed only 20 per cent of people are achieving that. Start the conversation, or Read more at Australian Broadcasting Corporation.
